resources.string: App is structured as an Inventory Management App that allows a Store to keep track of its product inventory and record sales. It allows to store every information of a Product along with its pictures and Suppliers information with their price and available-to-sell quantity. It also features Product procurement from Suppliers via the supplied Contact information of Suppliers recorded.
App designed and developed by Kaushik N Sanji as part of the project coursework done for the Android Basics Nanodegree course offered by Udacity.
Attribute Name \'%1$s\' has been defined more than once. Remove the duplicate.
Incomplete Product Attributes found. Please fill the missing details and then click on \'Save\'.
NULL Id found for Category \'%1$s\'. Data may be inconsistent.
Failed to delete the Item Id %1$d
All fields are required except for Product Attributes and Images. Please fill and then click on \'Save\'.
Failed to insert the Attributes and/or Images of Item \'%1$s\' with Item SKU #%1$s
No Product Found for Item Id %1$d
Product SKU is a mandatory field.
Product SKU needs to be Unique.\nTry a different one.
Item SKU #%1$s Update: Failed to insert Category for %1$s
Item SKU #%1$s Update: Failed to insert the Attributes and/or Images of Item.
Item SKU #%1$s Update: Failed to update Item data
Item SKU #%1$s Update: Failed to insert/erase the Images of Item.
Item SKU #%1$s Update: Image(s) of Item were successfully updated/erased.
Item SKU #%1$s Update: More than one record of Item was updated. Data may be inconsistent.
One of the Image(s) picked is already present in the list
Some image files could not be deleted. This will include the files NOT created by the app. Please delete them manually later.
Cannot save any image when the external storage is unmounted. Disconnect from PC and try again.
Tap the \"+\" button below to add the Images for the Product.
Device does not have Camera hardware to take a picture.
Failed to save the image taken.
Tap the \"+\" button below to record the Products in your Store.
New Item with SKU #%1$s added successfully.
Failed to update the inventory of the Product #%1$s.
Supplier Code #%1$s has been removed from the Product.
Supplier Code #%1$s has been restored for the Product.
No Products to Sell!?\nConfigure the Products first and then its Suppliers to start selling the Products here.
Failed to decrease the quantity of the Product #%1$s sold by the Supplier #%2$s.
One quantity of the Product #%1$s sold successfully by the Supplier #%2$s.
Item SKU #%1$s updated with inventory successfully.
Error while loading Products with Sales data.

To Supplier \"%1$s (%2$s)\",
Currently we have %3$s quantity of the Product \"%4$s (%5$s)\". We are in need of %6$s quantity to meet the demand. Please expedite the request at the earliest.

Regards,
{Store Name and address}
No contacts available for Product Procurement!
Supplier Code is a mandatory field.
Supplier Code needs to be Unique.\nTry a different one.
Failed to delete the Supplier Id %1$d
Contact Email \'%1$s\' has been defined more than once. Remove the duplicate.
Some Email Contacts are still invalid. Please correct and then click save.
No Contacts found for the Supplier. Minimum one Contact needs to be configured.
No field can be left empty. Please fill and then click on \'Save\'.
Failed to insert Supplier\'s Contacts and Items with their Price Info for the Supplier \'%1$s\' with Code #%1$s
Failed to insert Supplier record for %1$s
No Supplier Found for Supplier Id %1$d
Contact Phone \'%1$s\' has been defined more than once. Remove the duplicate.
Some Phone Contacts are still invalid. Please correct and then click save.
Phone Number is invalid. Ensure that it has %1$d-%2$d digits.
Item SKU #%1$s has been removed from the Supplier.
Item SKU #%1$s has been restored for the Supplier.
Supplier Code #%1$s Update: Failed to insert/delete Supplier\'s Contacts and Items with their Price Info.
Supplier Code #%1$s Update: Failed to update Supplier data
Supplier Code #%1$s Update: More than one record of Supplier was updated. Data may be inconsistent.
Tap the \"+\" button below to record the Suppliers for your Store.
New Supplier with Code #%1$s added successfully.
Could not find any Product with Name/SKU/Category containing \'%1$s\'. Try another search.
All available Products are already picked.
No product seems to be configured. Please setup the Products first.
